This page is generated with **R** from a CSV. Edit `data/projects.csv` to update your portfolio.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(readr)
library(htmltools)

projects <- readr::read_csv("data/projects.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

render_card <- function(title, role, year, summary, link=NULL, tags=NULL){
  tag_badges <- NULL
  if (!is.na(tags) && nzchar(tags)) {
    parts <- strsplit(tags, ";")[[1]]
    tag_badges <- tags$span(lapply(parts, function(t) tags$span(class="badge bg-secondary me-1", t)))
  }
  as.character(tags$div(class="card mb-3 p-3",
    tags$h4(title),
    tags$p(tags$strong(role), " â€¢ ", year),
    tags$p(summary),
    if(!is.na(link) && nzchar(link)) tags$a(href=link, target="_blank", "View") else NULL,
    tag_badges
  ))
}

html <- paste0(apply(projects, 1, function(r){
  render_card(r[['title']], r[['role']], r[['year']], r[['summary']], r[['link']], r[['tags']])
}), collapse="\n")

HTML(html)
```
